entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
